mapper.select: select r.r_idx,v.v_o_idx, r.r_cafe_name, r.r_room_name ,r.r_id, v.v_star,v.v_c_idx,v.v_reg_date,v.v_contents,v.v_idx from review v inner join reserv r on r.r_idx = v.v_r_idx where r.r_id = #{m_id} and v.v_del_gb = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into review(v_idx,v_o_idx,v_r_idx, v_writer, v_c_idx, v_contents, v_star, v_reg_date, v_del_gb, v_mod_date, v_type, v_read_hit) values(review_seq.nextval,#{v_o_idx}, #{v_r_idx}, #{m_id}, #{v_c_idx}, #{v_contents}, #{v_star}, sysdate, 'N', sysdate, 0, 0)
